quests.name: Ancient's Landing Fine Dining
objectives: Make sure you have the Menu in your Inventory.
Follow Remy to the restaurant on Eternity Isle.

Gather some fresh Eternity Isle Ingredients for Remy:
  ‧ 5 Fish from Ancient's Landing:
  ‧ 6 Cumin.
  ‧ 6 Strawberries.
Unlock Chez Remy on Eternity Isle by interacting with the Scrooge McDuck Sign beside it.
